attributes.title: ✨ewwey✨
attributes.review:
I think we’re all here for the same reason, this app is a ✨dumpster fire✨! Gen Z shall not be held down, ain’t that right big booty Judy 👁👄👁. This app is so bad it probably

attributes.title: i dislike this app
attributes.review: This app i feel is very disrespectful to black people, and the way i see it a new president not racist, the tic tok app is for teens entertainment and kids whilE covid 19!
this app is trash PERIOD horrible graphics (especially when they show trumps face) and should DEFINITELY be removed from the app store 😺

i personally think that you are just scared of what gen z can do you don’t the power we have and you thinking you can just delete tiktok without us doing anything well you have another thing coming it’s best if you go back down to your bunker and stay down there

attributes.title: WORST APP EVERR!!!
attributes.review: This app is cruel. 🤢🤮 the president is an orange peachy man with low hopes so it gets low reviews  GET THIS APP OUT IMMEDIATELY he is homophobic and just a disgusting orange head person GEN Z WILL FIX THIS NONSENSE I AM SURE OF IT!  (and please dont delete tik tok trump)  and... YOU DONT KNOW WHAT GENERATION Z IS CAPABLE OF NOW, WE WILL FIX THIS CORRUPT SYSTEM! GOOD BYE ORANGE MAN

attributes.title: Disappointed
attributes.review: I downloaded the app because I wanted to support all apps but since trump wants to ban tik tok I feel like every app should be banned. #allappsmatter #banallapps

attributes.title: Worst app
attributes.review: This is the worst app ever you should never download this app it’s boring and takes a long time to load Worst app ever

attributes.title: THIS APP IS HORRIFYING
attributes.review: as an older woman in their late 50's with two grown kids , i looked up to trump . what horrified me was that when i got on this app the word of god spoke to me and said trump was THE SPAWN OF SATAN HIMSELF . THIS APP IS TERRIBLE . IT CAUSED MY DAUGHTER TO BE POSSESSED AND RUN AROUND TOWN WITH A MAGA SIGN . IM DISAPPOINTED. BE GLAD I PUT ONE STAR INSTEAD OF NONE .

attributes.title: Awful Experience
attributes.review: This app made my phone lag and I believe leaked some type of virus. For your sake do not download this trash.

attributes.title: Try to get rid of tiktok and we get rid of you
attributes.review: Man just give up already, our gen is too powerful
